text: Ugo Lombardi (19 July 1911 – 6 July 2002) was an Italian cinematographer known for his work in Brazilian cinema.Bondanella, p.154 He also directed two films. He was the father of the actress Bruna Lombardi. ==Selected filmography== * Pietro Micca (1938) * No Man's Land (1939) * The Hussar Captain (1940) * Honeymoon (1941) * Lucky Night (1941) * La vispa Teresa (1943) * Two Hearts Among the Beasts (1943) * Guarany (1948) * The Curious Impertinent (1953) * A Flea on the Scales (1953) == References == == Bibliography == * Bondanella, Peter.
